from julia.api import Julia
jl = Julia(compiled_modules=False)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%load_ext julia.magic

Initializing Julia interpreter. This may take some time...
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%%julia
function hello(name)
    println("Hello ", name)
end
hello("there")

Hello there
